Can we talk about how this story really ends? 'MC goes to the police' "Hey, I'd like to report a rape, my girlfriend sent me a dvd or herself admitting to being raped by her coach at the training camp she went to a month ago." After police watch video: "She had her mind broken and probably won't want to press charges now, but in the dvd she admits to being raped and blackmailed" and even if she tries to defend the rapist, by saying she was acting and lying. The rapist is still guilty of statutory rape from the video. So the rapist ends up going to prison and ends up being raped everyday because he wanted to taunt the MC. On a side note, if I kidnap a girl and get her drugged up/ mindbroken and in the future she doesn't want to press any charges because she loves me, im still going to prison if she accidentally tells anyone we're together now because I kidnapped her, raped her, and mindbroke her.
